Uses of Interface
org.directwebremoting.event.MessageListener

Packages that use MessageListener
org.directwebremoting This package contains all the classes that are interesting to DWR users going about normal DWR business. 
 

Uses of MessageListener in org.directwebremoting
 

Methods in org.directwebremoting with parameters of type MessageListener
 void Hub.subscribe(java.lang.String topicName, MessageListener listener)
          Called to create a subscription so that future publishes to a similarly named topic alert the MessageListener that a publish has happened.
 boolean Hub.unsubscribe(java.lang.String topicName, MessageListener listener)
          Reverse the action of Hub.subscribe(String, MessageListener)
